rooms.description: Provides an inviting entry with natural light and direct access to the main living area.
Spacious living room with Vastu-aligned north-west orientation for positive energy flow.
Cozy dining area adjacent to the living room, promoting social interaction.
Functional kitchen designed on the eastern side in accordance with Vastu principles for energy and creativity.
Modern bathroom with adequate ventilation and accessibility from living areas.
Two-car garage accommodating vehicles along the north side to maintain balance as per local norms.
Adjacent to the kitchen for storage and service area.
